post.title: Yukarinette ConnectorNeo
post.description: Yukarinet Connector Neo is a communication tool that can translate from voice to a multitude of languages all in real time. The perfect tool to help bring your livestreams to a wider audience.
post.content:
Yukarinet Connector Neo is a communication tool that can translate from voice to a multitude of languages all in real-time. The perfect tool to help bring your live streams to a wider audience.

Instructions

How to use it is explained here.

We have made it as easy to use as possible, but there are a few steps involved in linking with smartphones, so please read the manual and give it a try.

In addition, if it does not work as expected even after reading the manual, you can submit a bug report to this community.
